extendedInfo.description: The greatest presentation of the Big Book ever. Now you can take it with you wherever you go...in the Car, Jogging, Working Out, or just laying in bed on a lazy Sunday afternoon. Over 6 hours of entertaining study of the Big Book of Alcoholics Anonymous. Joe McQ. & Charlie P. met in 1973 when Joe introduced Charlie as the AA speaker at an Al-Anon Convention. Joe had wondered if Charlie might be the country-western singer Charlie Pride. "He wasn't even the right color," Joe laments. They instantly discovered their mutual fascination with AA's basic text "The Big Book". What interested them most was that The Big Book was written in a particular sequence to convey certain ideas. That interest began a close friendship which has lasted to this day. They would frequently meet to discuss the book, often driving 225 miles to meet in each other's homes. Soon they were planning meetings in hotel rooms at AA conventions in Oklahoma and Arkansas, and within a few years, the meetings grew in popularity. In 1977, some members met in a Tulsa, OK hotel room for a discussion of the Big Book. One asked Joe & Charlie to come to his home group to present a program on the book. An AA taper made a four tape set of their presentation and called it "The Big Book Study". The tapes were gradually circulated throughout the fellowship and invitations were received for Joe & Charlie to present the study at AA conventions, roundups and special events. By 1980, there had been about eight studies offered. The CDs for this Big Book study generally sell for over $30. Now you can get them on you iPhone, iTouch, or iPad for a lot less. The Software herein is Copyright of Calidad Systems. The Joe and Charlie tapes are public domain.

reviews.title: Ripoff
reviews.comment: The entire content of this app is entirely available for FREE on the internet. Do a search for AA speakers and you\'ll quickly find the website that hosts the downloadable files.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thank you!!!
reviews.comment: Amazing that alcoholics can spend hundreds at the bar, but complain about a few bucks for recovery. This app is great. The developers did an amazing job.  Thank you.
reviews.author: David Alexander

reviews.title: BAD BUY!  It doesn\'t work for me on Samsung S3
reviews.comment: I brought the app for $4.99 and listened to Chapter 1   Next day I download the other chapters after having charged my device and CRASH!!!!  Nothing.... cannot play anything now I find it for free at silkworth.net.  Bad Buy!
reviews.author: Paul E. Marquis

reviews.title: Like it but it\'s noisy and loud
reviews.comment: They took the signal from the board AFTER the PA, when it should be before, so you don\'t hear much echo and noise. If you get bored, go to the Dr\'s opinion. That\'s where I got interested. It\'s full volume each time so be careful.
reviews.author: Michelle M

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Great listening and great app. Needs an autoplay feature for continuous play. Best $5 I\'ve spent. Maybe a bookmark?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: We know it is free on the internet. I need it on my phone 3,500 feet up. Well organized and easy to get to.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Has worked perfect from day one.  Love It!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Time for a drink
reviews.comment: Have this over 3 weeks. Took my money but won\'t download on phone. Sent 3  emails and nothing . Time for a pint
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Joe and Charlie
reviews.comment: An essential addition to your AA library - informative, funny, and a great way to learn the Big Book!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I was stoked when I saw this app...these guys r great. listened to them to & from work. Would give 5stars but I get some skips now and then. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Wonderful! Just what I needed!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: great app. great bb study. only wish I could listen to the while thing thru as one file.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Joe and charlie
reviews.comment: Great study of the big book. To bad I couldnt get past part2 to download for me. And no response to my e mail. UN uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worthwhile
reviews.comment: Love Joe & Charlie my sponsor introduced me to the tapes early on in my sobriety. Great way to study the \"Big Book\" driving to work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: A blessing! Some time ago, I paid $60-something for the CD\'s which I loaned out & lost. Now I can hear them on my Droid - don\'t even need a CD player!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Downloaded the app with no issues but when I tried to open the chapters all I get was network error messages. Sent several emails but no help. $5 lost
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mm
reviews.comment: doesn\'t work for me. No reply from developer. Don\'t waste your money or time with this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I am so grateful for this app best teaching ever!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t buy
reviews.comment: Purchased app and it doesn\'t op . en save your money

reviews.comment: Very Informative. Breaks down the BB like never before!
